author: @Raydaruckuz
text: Rabbi Weiss and Neterei Karta are the genuine article. I Met them like fifteen years ago and I got them supplies on the Shabbat, and the meeting stuck with me the genuine conviction and deep beliefs they all were moved by....it was a moment that helped shape my views on Judaism vs zioninsm and the inherent contradictions between both

author: @numbersix8919
text:
Count on a Bolshevik to give Jews a fair break!  Thank you for showing the actual position of Judaism regarding this fascistic and racist ideology. 
For anyone seeking actual refuge from actual antisemitism, backed by an actual superpower, the Jewish Autonomous Oblast established by the USSR still exists in Russian Far East.  It still enjoys its special status and Yiddish (which is officially unapproved in Israel) is still taught in school.  One of three Yiddish theaters is still open.  Anyone interested in saving centuries of the cultural legacy of European Jewry while escaping white supremacy are free to apply!
